title: BiJimmy
author: BiJimmy
created_time: August 29, 2023, 11:02:08 AMLast edit: August 29, 2023, 11:18:21 AM by BiJimmy
content: NFTM$: The NFT Museum Dollar is a cryptocurrency created in 2023, a meme coin supported by the NFT collection. Created: to support NFT artists, for trust-based wallet-to-wallet purchases of artist NFTs outside of NFT markets, and for speculative trading on crypto exchanges. We want to increase the coverage of NFT, we want to increase the support community of NFTM$, we want to increase the number of NFTM$ owners and we want to stably increase the value of our NFTM$ Meme coin. Website for complete and comprehensive information: https://nftmuzeum.wixsite.com/cryptocurrencyOnly sell if, years from now, it will be worth as much as Bitcoin today!To add the token to your wallet with the following information:Wallet (such as Metamask, Binance walet, SafePal Walet‚Ä¶ )BMB Smart ChainSymbol:NFTM$Contract (Token Address):0xB0Fb30c9BD27C00caC443602d3B5Bf35968Ee5a6Please follow these steps:1. Open your wallet (Metamask) and navigate to the "Assets" or "Tokens" section.2. Click on "Add Token" or "Custom Token" (depending on your wallet interface).3. Fill in the token information as follows:- Token Contract Address: 0xB0Fb30c9BD27C00caC443602d3B5Bf35968Ee5a6- Token Symbol: NFTM$- Token Decimals: (leave this field blank)Once you've entered this information, click on "Add" or "Save" to add the NFTM$ token to your wallet.When you are done with these, please click here and send me your wallet address in a private message. You will receive your NFTM$ tokens in a few days! (It's important to note that this token may not generate immediate profits for you. However, in the future, you might find it valuable and be grateful for this opportunity. It's a long-term investment with potential benefits down the line.Please provide me with your Metamask address so that I can send you the air drop. Thank you!)nftmuzeum@gmail.comOnly sell if, years from now, it will be worth as much as Bitcoin today!Introducing the NFT Museum Token NFTM$A securely built digital tool for trading and investing. I hope this message finds you in good health and spirits! I have some exciting news to share with you. In June 2023, I created a cryptocurrency called NFTM$ for NFT Museum investors, supporters and traders on the BMB Smart Chain. By adding the token to your Metamask (Biance wallet, SafePal wallet) wallet, you have already joined the growing community.1.NFT collector, Twitter:https://twitter.com/collector9723662.THE WORLD NFT ARTISTS' MAGAZINE:https://nftart2022magazine.blogspot.com/3.NFT Museum collection (OpenSea):https://opensea.io/NFTCollector9723664.Facebook group:https://www.facebook.com/groups/nft.nftart.nftgrups5.Discordhttps://discord.gg/XSHYn2trAz6.Token Cryptocurrency information :https://bscscan.com/token/0xB0Fb30c9BD27C00caC443602d3B5Bf35968Ee5a67.Cryptocurrency website:https://nftmuzeum.wixsite.com/cryptocurrency8.Cryptocurrency gift request (Airdrop):nftmuzeum@gmail.comThe conclusion of the Air Drop period will be announced on our social media platforms.

comments.author: BiJimmy
comments.body: We are looking for sympathetic activists to make NFTM$ more widely known. Twitter, Facebook, etc. marketing activities. In return, we pay with NFTM$. We believe in the development of our cryptocurrency, we are looking for like-minded individuals. Anyone who gets involved in this has an interest in promotion. It's a new cryptocurrency, so we want to introduce it to as many people as possible, discover as many owners as possible, and give it as a gift. Only 50,000,000 NFTM$ have been created and will remain so, so we are giving away tiny drops to make it worth a lot. We would like to register NFTM$ on cryptocurrency monitoring websites and cryptocurrency exchanges. For this, widespread recognition and many owners' wallets are essential. Come and join the "party" write: nftmuzeum@gmail.comCryptocurrency website:https://nftmuzeum.wixsite.com/cryptocurrency

comments.author: BiJimmy
comments.body: NFT exhibition support, charityYesterday we bought 32 pieces of beautiful artistic Nft for the collection of the NFT Museum. These NFTs also contribute to the coverage of NFTM$. Here you can watch the public pieces from the NFT Museum's collection on video:https://youtu.be/tIPwRnSTrGg?si=b_m7lMUrRjyg_WUFSupport of the exhibiting NFT artists, charityWith the support of the NFT Museum, an occasional group of Hungarian NFT artists organizes an online exhibition. The NFT Museum supports the artists with a little more than 4 NFTM$ per person. Support of NFT artists participating in the exhibition in our own media, in our magazineFurthermore, we publish articles about the artists participating in the exhibition in THE WORLD NFT ARTISTS' MAGAZINE. The first article about one of the artists participating in the exhibition can be read here:https://nftart2022magazine.blogspot.com/2023/09/exploring-artistry-of-toth-xenia-fusion.htmlWhat do we do against money laundering?The question may arise, how do we protect ourselves against money laundering in relation to NFTM$? NFTM$ was first split into several larger parts, three official wallets, due to hacker attacks. Of this, a larger amount remained active, of which we placed the largest amount, $27,000,000-29,000 000 NFTM$, in a cryptocurrency exchange liquidity collection pool. And from the remaining 9,000 NFTM$, we will give only a small amount of Airdrops, mostly to NFT artists. In the first round, we gave away 10 NFTM$, then 4 NFTM$, and then 1NFTM$. Thus, there is no question of money laundering. By the way, this is how we maintain the value of NFTM$, smartly.Let's get rewards together! https://app.dodoex.io/earn/mining?network=bsc-mainnet&mining=0x6d027f4557dcbde9d8386f78ba476cf3e66f6e31&side=baseOur website is available in several languagesA few days ago, in addition to English and German, the most important information about NFTM$ can be read in French, Swedish, Chinese and Hungarian. Come for Airdrop:https://nftmuzeum.wixsite.com/cryptocurrency

comments.author: BiJimmy
comments.body: NFTMuseum$ Cryptocurrency: The First Steps and Future Prospects¬†¬†Many people have asked the question: Why do we still see the NFTM$ airdrop value in our wallet as zero? Well, let's explain this in detail.NFTM$ is an extremely young cryptocurrency and accordingly has not yet been featured on the major crypto watch sites. One of the reasons for this is that a certain amount (10-20,000 pieces) of NFTM$ owner's wallet is required for price development and trading. So, before they have any value, they need to be present in multiple wallets. Only 49 wallets ( Link: https://bscscan.com/token/0xB0Fb30c9BD27C00caC443602d3B5Bf35968Ee5a6 ¬†) currently have NFTM$. That's why the Airdrop is still in progress. (Ask for your own airdrop! Read the relevant information, prepare your wallet to receive NFTM$, based on the instructions there and write to the e-mail address there: https://nftmuzeum.wixsite.com/cryptocurrency¬†¬†The concept of NFTM$ is primarily to support NFT artists, speculative investment and trade. We speculate, we bet, that their value will increase over time in the same way that Bitcoin, which was only a few dollars years ago, is now worth $26,000. ( 2023 Sept. 29 )We have also started the admission request on two crypto monitoring sites where we are waiting for NFTM$ to be listed. Although we know that this is still an early step, we are still constantly trying to ensure that NFTM$ is listed on these pages (Of course, we will also register it on cryptocurrency exchanges later, where the price of NFTM$ can be seen and traded publicly).¬†¬†As for the utilization of NFTM$ at the moment, there is now a beneficial option: on a platform where you can deposit NFTM$ and use it to make use of your airdrop allowance. Thus, NFTM$ not only represents value, but also grows. The current nominal value of 1 NFTM$ on this platform is 100 USDT.¬†¬†Here is the link where you can earn interest on your airdrop: Dodoex NFTM$ Earning interest: https://app.dodoex.io/earn/mining?network=bsc-mainnet&mining=0x6d027f4557dcbde9d8386f78ba476cf3e66f6e31&ivc=0x52ebE018Bd075680292e50B0E0DC1aead8Ab8E32 ¬†¬†In summary, NFTM$ is an exciting new cryptocurrency designed primarily to support NFT artists and provide long-term investment. Although you can't see its value in your wallet yet, you can contribute to its increase in value by taking the aforementioned steps.
